definitions.title: v.b.
definitions.body: surround (NH id., and deriv.; Ph. [[עטרת]] wreath, [[עטר]] Pi. denom. crown Lzb:339; Aram. [[עֲטַר]]; As. etêru, spare, rescue);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. sf. [[כַּצִּנׇּה רָחוֹן תַּעְטְרֶנּוּ]] Ps 5:13 as with a shield, with favour will thou surround him; Pt. pl. [[עׂטְרִים אֶל־דָּוִד]] 1Sa 23:26 Saul and his men were surrounding (closing in) upon David.
